nodes.text: Payback was a scenario for Star Wars Miniatures: Knights of the Old Republic, that was added to Wizards.com on August 19 2008. It was written by Sterling Hershey. It concerns a small group of Mandalorian mercenaries, who trapped on Taris after the planet is invaded by the Sith Empire in the year 3956 BBY, plan an attack on a newly established Sith outpost.
